mapper.select: SELECT c.community_no, c.class_no, c.community_content, to_char(to_date(c.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as regDate, c.community_type, u.user_id, u.name, u.nickname, u.profile_image FROM community c, users u WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id AND community_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (community_no, class_no, user_id, community_content, reg_date, community_type, ref_no) VALUES ( seq_community_community_no.NEXTVAL, #{article.hobbyClass.hobbyClassNo}, #{user.userId}, #{replyContent}, to_char( SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), '1', #{article.articleNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.community_no, c.class_no, c.community_content, to_char(to_date(c.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as regDate, c.ref_no, u.user_id, u.name, u.nickname, u.profile_image FROM community c, users u WHERE c.user_id = u.user_id AND ref_no = #{articleNo} ORDER BY reg_date
